{{portal|Stargate|Stargate-color.png}}
 
'''''Stargate''''' is a [[military science fiction]] [[Media franchise|franchise]], initially conceived by [[Roland Emmerich]] and [[Dean Devlin]]. The first film in the franchise was simply titled ''[[Stargate (film)|Stargate]]''. It was originally released on October 28, 1994 by [[Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer]] and [[Carolco]], and became a worldwide hit grossing nearly $200 million ([[USD]]) worldwide. Three years later, [[Canada|Canadian]] [[Brad Wright]] and [[Jonathan Glassner]] created a [[television series]] entitled ''[[Stargate SG-1]]'' as a sequel for the film.
'''''Stargate''''' is a [[military science fiction]] [[Media franchise|franchise]], initially conceived by [[Roland Emmerich]] and [[Dean Devlin]]. The first film in the franchise was simply titled ''[[Stargate (film)|Stargate]]''. It was originally released on October 28, 1994 by [[Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer]] and [[Carolco]], and became a worldwide hit grossing nearly $200 million ([[USD]]) worldwide. Three years later, [[Canada|Canadian]] [[Brad Wright]] and [[Jonathan Glassner]] created a [[television series]] entitled ''[[Stargate SG-1]]'' as a sequel for the film.
